You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The first and last rows are filled with X's. The second row has three blank squares followed by an X and another blank square. The third row has two blank squares, an X, and two more blank squares. The fourth row has a blank square, an X, and three blank squares.
continue

The first row has five X's, the second row has four with one blank square before the X's start, the third row has three X's with two blank squares before them, the fourth row has two X's with three blank squares before them, and the fifth and final row has one X with four blank squares before it.
